test.test_mongo package¶

Submodules¶

test.test_mongo.conftest module¶

test.test_mongo.conftest.client()[source]¶

Create the configuration that we will have to use to be able to run our test cases, with this method we won’t be able to run our test cases

test.test_mongo.test_add_item module¶

test.test_mongo.test_add_item.test_add_item(client)[source]¶

Test that an item has added into the db successfully. Compare the actual stock with an stock that alredy has the new inserted into the db

test.test_mongo.test_delete_item module¶

test.test_mongo.test_delete_item.test_delete_item(client)[source]¶

Test that delete an item from the data base successfully. First we have to add to the db the element that we want to the delete and after this new element has been inserted to the db we can proceed with his deletion from the db. To check the process has been executed successfully it compares the actual stock with an stock that alredy has the new inserted into the db

test.test_mongo.test_item module¶

test.test_mongo.test_item.test_item(client)[source]¶

Test to get the elements martching the criteria. The user has to specify the requested name of the elements and the test case check that returns a list with all the elements that match the requested criteria

test.test_mongo.test_item.test_nonItem(client)[source]¶

Test to get an element from the data base that doen’t exist or doesn’t axist anymore. In case the request element it can’t be found isnide the db will display a message giving information to the user explainig that the requested element it can’t be found isnide the db

test.test_mongo.test_item.test_nonItemName(client)[source]¶

Test to get an element without name. If an element from the data base has been request but has not specified the name it will return a message giving information to the user explaining that to get an element from de db has to specify the name of the requested element

test.test_mongo.test_quality module¶

test.test_mongo.test_quality.test_quality(client)[source]¶

Test to get the elements martching the criteria. The user has to specify the requested quality and the test case check that returns a list with all the elements that match the requested criteria

test.test_mongo.test_quality.test_quality_fail(client)[source]¶

Test to check that if the requested elements by their quality doesn’t match any criteria into the db, in this case it will display a message giving information to the user that the requested elements matching the quality can’t be found inside the db

test.test_mongo.test_sell_in module¶

test.test_mongo.test_sell_in.test_sell_in(client)[source]¶

Test to get the elements martching the criteria. The user has to specify the requested sell_in and the test case check that returns a list with all the elements that match the requested criteria

test.test_mongo.test_sell_in.test_sell_in_fail(client)[source]¶

Test to check that if the requested elements by their sell_in doesn’t match any criteria into the db, in this case it will display a message giving information to the user that the requested elements matching the sell_in can’t be found inside the db

test.test_mongo.test_stock module¶

test.test_mongo.test_stock.test_stock(client)[source]¶

Test to get all the stock of the data base. This test case check that the default stock match the stock that the data base should contain

test.test_mongo.test_update_stock module¶

test.test_mongo.test_update_stock.test_update_stock(client)[source]¶

Test to check if the elements from the data base have been update their quality correctly. This test case access to the endpoint with the duty to update the quality of the elements that are included into the db. And after we request the stock included inside the data base. Finally we compare if the stock that we got from the db is equal to the stock that has update the quality of his elements

test.test_mongo.test_welcome module¶

test.test_mongo.test_welcome.test_welcome(client)[source]¶

Test case to check that the default endpoint is configured correctly and the test cases can be run correctly without any issue
